hero.title: WinjoPro
hero.tagline: AI Coach for Food Safety in Kenya
hero.subtitle: Empowering communities through food safety and hygiene training.
hero.description: Smart training for safer food, from your kitchen to the community. Prepare for food safety certification through accessible, AI-assisted learning that speaks your language.

visual.realKitchenScenariosAndVisualExamples: Our AI coach uses real kitchen scenarios and visual examples to make food safety concepts easy to understand and remember.

features.title: Powerful Features for Food Safety
features.subtitle: Everything you need to master food safety and get certified, powered by AI
features.aiDescription: Chat-based assistant in Swahili, English & Sheng guiding you through training with personalized support
features.interactiveModulesDescription: Short audio-visual courses covering hygiene, storage, and certification prep with hands-on activities
features.smartAssessmentDescription: AI-powered photo analysis and quizzes to evaluate your kitchen and prepare for certification
features.certificationPrepDescription: Mock tests and real inspection scenarios with performance tips to ensure you pass on the first try
features.communitySupportDescription: Connect with trainers, NGOs, and health officers for ongoing support and group learning
features.multiPlatformAccessDescription: Available on WhatsApp, web, and mobile app for maximum accessibility across all devices

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from vendors who transformed their businesses with WinjoPro

testimonials.name: Mary Wanjiku
testimonials.quote: WinjoPro helped me understand food safety in Kiswahili. Now my customers trust my food more!

testimonials.name: John Kiprotich
testimonials.quote: The AI coach made learning easy. We passed our health inspection on the first try!

testimonials.name: Grace Achieng
testimonials.quote: The photo assessment feature helped me identify problems I never noticed before.

curriculum.title: Complete Training Curriculum
curriculum.subtitle: Five comprehensive modules designed specifically for Kenyan food vendors and kitchens

modules.title: Introduction to Food Safety
modules.description: Understanding food safety basics and why it matters for your business

modules.title: Hygiene & Cleanliness
modules.description: Personal hygiene practices and proper cleaning procedures

modules.title: Food Handling & Storage
modules.description: Safe storage temperatures and proper handling techniques

modules.title: Kitchen Setup & Safety
modules.description: Optimal kitchen layout and waste management systems

modules.title: Certification Requirements
modules.description: Documents needed and inspection preparation strategies
